posts.postText:
I'm adding WolfDJ to TTT, it adds the ability to stream music in-game to the server. 
If you want a login, send me a message. Kryzoid, Ben, I've already made you accounts. Contact me for access. 

Also, the passwords are shown as plain text, so if you don't want me to know your email or steam password, don't use that as a password once you're able to change it.

http://nnjg.site.nfoservers.com/wdj4/
